terms.name: Jitendex
terms.description: A free and openly licensed Japanese-to-English dictionary with example sentences, usage notes, etymology notes, cross references, antonyms, definition notes.

kanji.name: KANJIDIC
kanji.description: An English dictionary listing readings, meanings, and other info about kanji characters.

frequency.name: BCCWJ
frequency.description: A frequency dictionary based on the Balanced Corpus of Contemporary Written Japanese.
